docs.description: Create a record

tags.title: param
tags.description: Type of resource to create. E.g. `trackedEntityInstances`, `programs`, `events`, ...
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: magic
tags.description: resourceType $.children.resourceTypes[*]

tags.title: param
tags.description: Object which defines data that will be used to create a given instance of resource. To create a single instance of a resource, `data` must be a javascript object, and to create multiple instances of a resources, `data` must be an array of javascript objects.
tags.name: data

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional `options` to define URL parameters via params (E.g. `filter`, `dimension` and other import parameters), request config (E.g. `auth`) and the DHIS2 apiVersion.
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a program

tags.title: example
tags.caption: an event

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a trackedEntityInstance

tags.title: example
tags.description: create('dataSets', { name: 'OpenFn Data Set', periodType: 'Monthly' });
tags.caption: a dataSet

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a dataSetNotification

docs.description:
Update data. A generic helper function to update a resource object of any type.
Updating an object requires to send `all required fields` or the `full body`

tags.title: param
tags.description: The type of resource to be updated. E.g. `dataElements`, `organisationUnits`, etc.
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: param
tags.description: The `id` or `path` to the `object` to be updated. E.g. `FTRrcoaog83` or `FTRrcoaog83/{collection-name}/{object-id}`
tags.name: path

tags.title: param
tags.description: Data to update. It requires to send `all required fields` or the `full body`. If you want `partial updates`, use `patch` operation.
tags.name: data

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional `options` to define URL parameters via params (E.g. `filter`, `dimension` and other import parameters), request config (E.g. `auth`) and the DHIS2 apiVersion.
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a program

tags.title: example
tags.caption: an event

tags.title: example
tags.description:
update('trackedEntityInstances', 'IeQfgUtGPq2', {
  created: '2015-08-06T21:12:37.256',
  orgUnit: 'TSyzvBiovKh',
  createdAtClient: '2015-08-06T21:12:37.256',
  trackedEntityInstance: 'IeQfgUtGPq2',
  lastUpdated: '2015-08-06T21:12:37.257',
  trackedEntityType: 'nEenWmSyUEp',
  inactive: false,
  deleted: false,
  featureType: 'NONE',
  programOwners: [
    {
      ownerOrgUnit: 'TSyzvBiovKh',
      program: 'IpHINAT79UW',
      trackedEntityInstance: 'IeQfgUtGPq2',
    },
  ],
  enrollments: [],
  relationships: [],
  attributes: [
    {
      lastUpdated: '2016-01-12T00:00:00.000',
      displayName: 'Last name',
      created: '2016-01-12T00:00:00.000',
      valueType: 'TEXT',
      attribute: 'zDhUuAYrxNC',
      value: 'Russell',
    },
    {
      lastUpdated: '2016-01-12T00:00:00.000',
      code: 'MMD_PER_NAM',
      displayName: 'First name',
      created: '2016-01-12T00:00:00.000',
      valueType: 'TEXT',
      attribute: 'w75KJ2mc4zz',
      value: 'Catherine',
    },
  ],
});
tags.caption: a trackedEntityInstance

tags.title: example
tags.description: update('dataSets', 'lyLU2wR22tC', { name: 'OpenFN Data Set', periodType: 'Weekly' });
tags.caption: a dataSet

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a dataSetNotification

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a dataElement

docs.description:
Get data. Generic helper method for getting data of any kind from DHIS2.
- This can be used to get `DataValueSets`,`events`,`trackedEntityInstances`,`etc.`

tags.title: param
tags.description: The type of resource to get(use its `plural` name). E.g. `dataElements`, `trackedEntityInstances`,`organisationUnits`, etc.
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: param
tags.description: A query object that will limit what resources are retrieved when converted into request params.
tags.name: query

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional `options` to define URL parameters via params beyond filters, request configuration (e.g. `auth`) and DHIS2 api version to use.
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: returns
tags.description: state

tags.title: example
tags.caption: all data values for the 'pBOMPrpg1QX' dataset

tags.title: example
tags.description: get('programs', { orgUnit: 'TSyzvBiovKh', fields: '*' });
tags.caption: all programs for an organization unit

tags.title: example
tags.caption: a single tracked entity instance by a unique external ID

docs.description: Upsert a record. A generic helper function used to atomically either insert a row, or on the basis of the row already existing, UPDATE that existing row instead.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The type of a resource to `upsert`. E.g. `trackedEntityInstances`
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: param
tags.description: A query object that allows to uniquely identify the resource to update. If no matches found, then the resource will be created.
tags.name: query

tags.title: param
tags.description: The data to use for update or create depending on the result of the query.
tags.name: data

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional configuration that will be applied to both the `get` and the `create` or `update` operations.
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: throws
tags.description: Throws range error

tags.title: example
tags.caption: Example `expression.js` of upsert

docs.description: Discover `DHIS2` `api` `endpoint` `query parameters` and allowed `operators` for a given resource's endpoint.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The HTTP to inspect parameter usage for a given endpoint, e.g., `get`, `post`,`put`,`patch`,`delete`
tags.name: httpMethod

tags.title: param
tags.description: The path for a given endpoint. E.g. `/trackedEntityInstances` or `/dataValueSets`
tags.name: endpoint

tags.title: example
tags.description: discover('post', '/trackedEntityInstances')
tags.caption: a list of parameters allowed on a given endpoint for specific http method

docs.description:
Patch a record. A generic helper function to send partial updates on one or more object properties.
- You are not required to send the full body of object properties.
- This is useful for cases where you don't want or need to update all properties on a object.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The type of resource to be updated. E.g. `dataElements`, `organisationUnits`, etc.
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: param
tags.description: The `id` or `path` to the `object` to be updated. E.g. `FTRrcoaog83` or `FTRrcoaog83/{collection-name}/{object-id}`
tags.name: path

tags.title: param
tags.description: Data to update. Include only the fields you want to update. E.g. `{name: "New Name"}`
tags.name: data

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional configuration, including params for the update ({preheatCache: true, strategy: 'UPDATE', mergeMode: 'REPLACE'}). Defaults to `{operationName: 'patch', apiVersion: state.configuration.apiVersion, responseType: 'json'}`
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: example
tags.description: patch('dataElements', 'FTRrcoaog83', { name: 'New Name' });
tags.caption: a dataElement

docs.description: Delete a record. A generic helper function to delete an object

tags.title: param
tags.description: The type of resource to be deleted. E.g. `trackedEntityInstances`, `organisationUnits`, etc.
tags.name: resourceType

tags.title: param
tags.description: Can be an `id` of an `object` or `path` to the `nested object` to `delete`.
tags.name: path

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional. This is useful when you want to remove multiple objects from a collection in one request. You can send `data` as, for example, `{"identifiableObjects": [{"id": "IDA"}, {"id": "IDB"}, {"id": "IDC"}]}`. See more {@link https://docs.dhis2.org/2.34/en/dhis2_developer_manual/web-api.html#deleting-objects on DHIS2 API docs}
tags.name: data

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional `options` for `del` operation including params e.g. `{preheatCache: true, strategy: 'UPDATE', mergeMode: 'REPLACE'}`. Run `discover` or see {@link https://docs.dhis2.org/2.34/en/dhis2_developer_manual/web-api.html#create-update-parameters DHIS2 documentation}. Defaults to `{operationName: 'delete', apiVersion: state.configuration.apiVersion, responseType: 'json'}`
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional callback to handle the response
tags.name: callback

tags.title: example
tags.description: destroy('trackedEntityInstances', 'LcRd6Nyaq7T');
tags.caption: a tracked entity instance

docs.description: Gets an attribute value by its case-insensitive display name

tags.title: example
tags.description: findAttributeValue(state.data.trackedEntityInstances[0], 'first name')

tags.title: param
tags.description: A tracked entity instance (TEI) object
tags.name: trackedEntityInstance

tags.title: param
tags.description: The 'displayName' to search for in the TEI's attributes
tags.name: attributeDisplayName

docs.description: Converts an attribute ID and value into a DSHI2 attribute object

tags.title: example
tags.description: attr('w75KJ2mc4zz', 'Elias')

tags.title: param
tags.description: A tracked entity instance (TEI) attribute ID.
tags.name: attribute

tags.title: param
tags.description: The value for that attribute.
tags.name: value

docs.description: Converts a dataElement and value into a DSHI2 dataValue object

tags.title: example
tags.description: dv('f7n9E0hX8qk', 12)

tags.title: param
tags.description: A data element ID.
tags.name: dataElement

tags.title: param
tags.description: The value for that data element.
tags.name: value

docs.description: Creates a custom step (or operation) for more flexible job writing.

tags.title: example
param
tags.description: is the function
tags.name: func

docs.description: A custom operation that will only execute the function if the condition returns true

tags.title: example
tags.description: fnIf((state) => state?.data?.name, get("https://example.com"));

tags.title: param
tags.description: The condition that returns true
tags.name: condition

tags.title: param
tags.description: The operation needed to be executed.
tags.name: operation

docs.description:
Picks out a single value from source data.
If a JSONPath returns more than one value for the reference, the first
item will be returned.

tags.title: example
tags.description: sourceValue('$.key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `state`.
tags.name: path

docs.description: Ensures a path points at the data.

tags.title: example
tags.description: dataPath('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `data`.
tags.name: path

docs.description:
Picks out a single value from the source data objectâ€”usually `state.data`.
If a JSONPath returns more than one value for the reference, the first
item will be returned.

tags.title: example
tags.description: dataValue('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `data`.
tags.name: path

docs.description: Picks out the last reference value from source data.

tags.title: example
tags.description: lastReferenceValue('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `references`.
tags.name: path

docs.description:
Scopes an array of data based on a JSONPath.
Useful when the source data has `n` items you would like to map to
an operation.
The operation will receive a slice of the data based of each item
of the JSONPath provided.

It also ensures the results of an operation make their way back into
the state's references.

tags.title: example
param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `state`.
tags.name: dataSource

tags.title: param
tags.description: The operation needed to be repeated.
tags.name: operation

docs.description: Returns a key, value pair in an array.

tags.title: example
tags.description: field('destination_field_name__c', 'value')

tags.title: param
tags.description: Name of the field
tags.name: key

tags.title: param
tags.description: The value itself or a sourceable operation.
tags.name: value

docs.description: Zips key value pairs into an object.

tags.title: example
tags.description: fields(list_of_fields)

tags.title: param
tags.description: a list of fields
tags.name: fields

docs.description: Merges fields into each item in an array.

tags.title: example
param
tags.description: Group of fields to merge in.
tags.name: fields
